resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/108172</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>108172</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085942</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Letting students ask the questions -- and answer them</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lassend beantworten Kursteilnehmer die Fragen 
stellen -- und sie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Laissant les étudiants poser les questions -- et 
leur répondent</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Deixando os estudantes para fazer as perguntas -- 
e respondem-lhes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lasciando gli allievi per fare le domande -- e 
rispondono loro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αφήνοντας τους σπουδαστές να υποβάλουν τις ερωτήσεις 
-- και να απαντήσουν σε τις</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Dejando los estudiantes para hacer las preguntas 
-- y les contestan</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">For this high school science teacher, learning science means doing science. A look at an inquiry-based earth and environmental science classroom.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Für diesen High School Wissenschaft Lehrer 
bedeutet erlernenwissenschaft das Tun von von Wissenschaft. Ein 
Blick auf eine Anfrage-gegründete Masse und Klimaein wissenschaft 
Klassenzimmer.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pour ce professeur de la science de lycée, la 
science d'étude signifie faire la science. Un regard à une 
terre enquête-basée et à une salle de classe environnementale de la
science.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Para este professor da ciência da High School, a 
ciência de aprendizagem significa fazer a ciência. Um olhar em
uma terra inquérito-baseada e em uma sala de aula ambiental da 
ciência.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Per questo insegnante di scienza della High 
School, la scienza imparante significa fare la scienza. Uno 
sguardo ad una terra inchiesta-basata e ad un'aula ambientale di 
scienza.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Για αυτόν τον καθηγητή θετικών επιστημών γυμνασίου, η
επιστήμη εκμάθησης σημαίνει την επιστήμη. Ένα βλέμμα σε 
μια έρευνα-βασισμένη στον γη και μια περιβαλλοντική τάξη 
επιστήμης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Para este profesor de la ciencia de la High School
secundaria, la ciencia que aprende significa hacer ciencia. Una 
mirada en una tierra pregunta-basada y una sala de clase ambiental de 
la ciencia.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:AMY ANDERSON
FN:AMY ANDERSON
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>108172</entry>
    </identifier>

      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/libraries/letting-students-ask-the-questions-and-answer-them</uri>

    </item>
  </manifestation>
